title: Winter warmers: top coats and how to style them – in pictures
description: Whether you are looking to hire one for a special occasion, shop pre-loved or find a high street hero, invest in a classic style to last for years Continue reading...
author: Photographer Jon Gorrigan; fashion editors Jo Jones and Helen Seamons
excerpt: Whether you are looking to hire one for a special occasion, shop pre-loved or find a high street hero, invest in a classic style to last for years
text: Annie wears double breasted coat, £368, reiss.com. Rugby top, £27.50, marksandspencer.com. Jersey hoodie, £139, reiss.com. Trainers, £305, axelarigato.com. Socks, £20, falke.com.
